page.title: 17RELIGION
page.content: A minority of the population attend a place of worship. In Kilkhampton there is an Anglican Church with a resident rector, a Methodist Chapel served by the Bude circuit ministry, and a "Fellowship" Chapel with a resident minister. There is also a Methodist Chapel at Bush and Grimscott. If asked to state their religion, it has been estimated that twelve households would claim to belong to the Methodist Church, six to The Church of England and one Roman Catholic. The other six households are not believed to attend any place of worship.
